name: Demo Day Finalist: Androidema
description:
Androidema by Heather S.

Game Summary:

You play as a robot called One and you go on a journey with robots you rescue and you go on a quest to find out the cause of the hostile robot virus.

Game Controls:

To enter full screen, click the expand icon on the bottom right

  • WASD to move
  • Click the dialogue box to progress
  • Click on objects to interact
